title: Apple’s iPhone 15 cameras need some major changes to beat the Pixel
description: New hardware is nice, but Apple needs to address some long-running issues too.

title: Don’t buy a Fitbit or Pixel Watch if you care about swim tracking
description: Absolutely useless both in the pool and once you step out of it.

title: Nothing Phone 2 vs Pixel 7: Same price, different approach
description: The battle of two very good phones that take rather different approaches to reach the same price point.

title: Buying a Pixel Fold or Galaxy Z Fold 5? Get a kickstand case and thank me later
description: A kickstand case gives you a much bigger canvas for everything from gaming to videos.
